Name: Landmarks, 395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment, Brooklyn (C 260041 HUK).
Title: Application number C 260041 HUK (395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment) submitted by the NYC Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Section 505 of Article 15 of the New York State General Municipal Law (Urban Renewal) and Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the sixth amendment of the Brookly Center Urban Renewal Plan, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 2, Council District 35.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
